## FilepickerBuilderOptions.path property

Path adapter for path operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
path: PathAdapter;
```

## Remarks

Required for path manipulation (dirname, join, etc.). For Node.js, use `platform.path` from `createNodePlatform()`<!-- -->.
